query:
UPDATE island_guides SET 
description = 'Maafushi is a vibrant local island in Kaafu Atoll, offering an authentic Maldivian experience without the luxury resort prices. Known for its excellent diving and snorkeling, budget-friendly guesthouses, and lively atmosphere, Maafushi is perfect for backpackers and water sports enthusiasts.',
attractions = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Bikini Beach', 'description', 'Main beach with chairs and water sports facilities, across from Arena Beach Hotel. Clear turquoise waters ideal for swimming and relaxation.', 'location', 'Central Maafushi'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Biyadhoo Reef', 'description', 'Popular snorkeling destination with colorful coral gardens, tropical fish, and marine life.', 'location', 'Near Maafushi'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Turtle Reef', 'description', 'Excellent spot for turtle watching and snorkeling with pristine coral formations.', 'location', 'Near Maafushi'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Local Island Shops', 'description', 'Colorful local shops and cafes selling souvenirs, handicrafts, and local goods.', 'location', 'Main Street')
),
activities = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Snorkeling Tours', 'description', 'Half-day snorkeling trips to nearby reefs with equipment and photos included. Prices from $15-25 per person.', 'duration', '4-5 hours', 'price', '$15-25'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Scuba Diving', 'description', 'Single dives ($40), Discover Scuba courses ($75), and 2-day certification courses ($315) available through local dive shops.', 'duration', '2-4 hours', 'price', '$40-315'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Dolphin Watching', 'description', 'Evening boat tours to spot dolphins in their natural habitat, often combined with snorkeling.', 'duration', '2-3 hours', 'price', '$20-30'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Fishing Trips', 'description', 'Morning fishing trips ($80) or sunset fishing with BBQ dinner ($25). Great for all skill levels.', 'duration', '3-4 hours', 'price', '$25-80'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Resort Day Tours', 'description', 'Visit luxury resort islands, explore overwater bungalows, and enjoy resort facilities for the day.', 'duration', '6-8 hours', 'price', '$70-100'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Water Sports', 'description', 'Jetskiing, windsurfing, waterskiing, flyboarding, parasailing, kayaking, and paddleboarding available.', 'duration', 'Varies', 'price', '$30-80'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Picnic Island Tours', 'description', 'Half-day trips to sandbanks with lunch, snorkeling, and dolphin watching included.', 'duration', '4-5 hours', 'price', '$30-40')
),
foodAndDining = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Local Restaurants', 'description', 'Affordable local eateries serving traditional Maldivian cuisine and international dishes.', 'priceRange', '$5-15'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Beachfront Cafes', 'description', 'Casual cafes with sea views, serving coffee, snacks, and light meals.', 'priceRange', '$3-10'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Hotel Restaurants', 'description', 'Guesthouses and hotels offer dining options ranging from budget to mid-range.', 'priceRange', '$10-25'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'BBQ Dinners', 'description', 'Sunset fishing trips often include BBQ dinners on the boat or beach.', 'priceRange', '$25')
),
quickFacts = JSON_ARRAY(
  'Budget-friendly local island alternative to luxury resorts',
  'Excellent diving and snorkeling with diverse marine life',
  'Home to vibrant backpacker community and lively nightlife',
  'Easily accessible from Male by ferry (45 min, $3-5) or speedboat (30 min, $18-25)',
  'Modest dress code required on the island',
  'Multiple guesthouses and budget hotels available',
  'Water sports and fishing are popular activities'
),
flightInfo = 'Maafushi is not served by direct flights. Fly into Velana International Airport (MLE) in Male, then take a ferry or speedboat to Maafushi.',
speedboatInfo = 'Speedboat from Male to Maafushi takes approximately 30 minutes and costs $18-25 per person. Multiple daily departures available.',
ferryInfo = 'Public ferry from Male to Maafushi takes approximately 45 minutes and costs $3-5 per person. Budget-friendly option with multiple daily schedules.'
WHERE slug = 'maafushi-island';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute UPDATE island_guides SET

logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 1: Unknown column 'description' in 'field list'
